Users can view their own evaluations.name: Users can view their own evaluations

Admins can view and create evaluations.name: Admins can view and create evaluations
Admins can view and create evaluations.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
        FROM user_roles
        WHERE ((user_roles.id = auth.uid()) AND (user_roles.role = 'admin'::text))))

Group members can update their group.name: Group members can update their group
Group members can update their group.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM midterm_group_members 
        WHERE midterm_group_members.group_id = midterm_groups.id 
        AND midterm_group_members.user_id = auth.uid()
      )

Students can submit their own assignment.name: Students can submit their own assignments

Students can update their own submission.name: Students can update their own submissions

Lecturers and admins can grade submissio.name: Lecturers and admins can grade submissions
Lecturers and admins can grade submissio.using:
(
        EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM user_roles 
          WHERE user_roles.id = auth.uid() 
          AND user_roles.role IN ('lecturer', 'admin')
        )
      )

Only lecturers and admins can create ass.name: Only lecturers and admins can create assignments
Only lecturers and admins can create ass.withCheck:
(
        EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM user_roles 
          WHERE user_roles.id = auth.uid() 
          AND user_roles.role IN ('lecturer', 'admin')
        )
      )

Admins can view all profiles.using:
